content.html: @jk_rowling is a conspiracy theorist. Here she is, in her own words, setting out her conspiracy theory about LGBTQIA+ people:
content.value:
@jk_rowling is a conspiracy theorist.

Here she is, in her own words, setting out her conspiracy theory about LGBTQIA+ people:

photo.alt: “I am fighting what I see, as a powerful, insidious misogynistic movement that I think has gained huge purchase in very influential areas of society. I do not see this particular movement as either benign or powerless,” she said.
